verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's] misguided threat to [V: impose] [ARG1: steep tariffs on Chinese exports to the U.S.] would inflict harm on American consumers . To understand why , take a close look at his iPhone .
President Donald Trump 's misguided threat to impose steep tariffs on Chinese exports to the U.S. [V: would] inflict harm on American consumers . To understand why , take a close look at his iPhone .
